mapper.sql:
FROM jsMember a
WHERE 1=1 AND a.delNy = #{shdelNy}
AND gender = 101 AND gender = 102
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.nickname ,a.dob ,a.gender
,a.phoneAgency ,a.phoneNum ,a.email ,a.emailInsert ,a.emailDomain ,a.id ,a.delNy ,a.registerDateTime ,a.modifiedDateTime
order by a.seq DESC
SELECT nickname FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
SELECT seq ,nickname ,dob ,gender ,email ,id ,delNy ,registerDateTime ,modifyDateTime FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
SELECT id FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND dob = #{dob} AND email=#{email} And delNy = 0
SELECT b.nickname ,c.survey FROM jsFavorite a inner join jsSurveyName c on c.snSeq = a.jsSurveyName_snSeq inner join jsMember b on b.seq = a.jsMember_seq WHERE b.seq =#{seq}
SELECT seq ,id FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND delNy=0
SELECT seq ,id FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND delNy=0 AND adminNy=1
SELECT seq ,id ,nickname FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND password = #{password} AND delNy = 0
SELECT seq ,id ,nickname FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND password =#{password} AND delNy=0 AND adminNy=1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(email) FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND email=#{email}
SELECT seq ,snsId FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND email=#{email} AND delNy=0
mapper.update: UPDATE jsMember SET delNy = 1 WHERE seq=#{seq}
